page.title: 20TRANSPORT
page.content: The M1 motorway is routed through this section, from north to south and although has no actual junction, one is situated only a few miles to the south. The A6 is a trunk road and cuts through Shardlow, making this village a very busy one for traffic. There is a secondary road (B6540) which starts in Birmingham is routed through Sawley to Nottingham. There are 'estates' of streets and avenues in Old Sawley and New Sawley and minor roads to Church Wilne from Shardlow. Barton's Transport of Chilwell, Notts. run regular bus services through Sawley to Long Eaton, & Nottingham and in the opposite direction to Castle Donington & East Midlands Airport. Trent Motor Traction Co.Ltd.,Derby operate from Derby through Shardlow to Castle Donington.
